translations.translation: For each cloud project, the admin contact can change the billing and admin contacts via a section dedicated to that effect in the control panel.
The admin contact can also add contacts with read-write access or read-only access for this project.

Note: Contacts in read-write mode have rights that can generate extra costs (modification of the infrastructure, storage usage). Contacts in read-only mode can't perform any actions on the project. The default payment method of the billing contact is used for each bill.
In a few days, you'll be able to change these contacts in your new control panel.
No data about the rights was found.
Oops! We're unable to retrieve details about the rights.
Oops! We're unable to add the right.
Oops! We're unable to delete the right.
Oops! The specified contact is invalid.
Oops! We're unable to update the contact.
